name: Corporations and partnerships
text: §464-12  Corporations and partnerships.  A corporation or copartnership may engage in the practice of professional engineering, architecture, surveying, or landscape architecture in the State if the person or persons connected with the corporation or copartnership directly in charge of the professional work is duly licensed. [L 1923, c 227, §7; RL 1925, §3689; am L 1933, c 134, §3; RL 1935, §7040; RL 1945, §7612; RL 1955, §166-12; HRS §464-12; am L 1970, c 85, §1; am L 1983, c 155, §8; am L 1989, c 210, §14; am L 1997, c 8, §4]
